alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 17 at 8:35PM PST until December 18 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Coast and Mendocino Coast Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas that remain clear tonight will see frost form.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.
